title: Hera Pheri (2000)
summary: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned.

title: Betaal
summary: A remote village becomes the arena of a breathless battle when an undead East India Company officer and his battalion of zombie redcoats attack a squad of modern-day soldiers.

title: Paatal Lok
summary: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit of it leads him to 'Paatal Lok', and to sh     ocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.
